Product Description

5,000mAh Super Battery

Never search for a power outlet again, the F91 5G offers a long lasting 5,000mAh battery that can last all day and all night. 18W Quick Charging along with Wireless Charger for a stress-free experience.

Unlock Your World

The F91 5G ensures total security for all your important applications and files. Unlocked your smartphone with a press of a finger or simply use its face ID technology.

Android 11

Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone, giving you powerful device controls, and easier ways to manager conversations, privacy setting and so much more.

The Power of 5G, F91 5G provides lightning-fast connectivity experience whenever and wherever you are
3-Day Battery to fit your busy lifestyle, a powerful 5,000mAh battery and 18W Quick charging along with 10W Wireless charging for a stress-free experience.
Boundless views with 6.8” Full HD+ Infinity dot display. Watch your favorite movies and play your favorite games with stunning color and resolution
Capture the best images and take the best selfies, with the Quad A.I 48MP Samsung GM1 sensor camera
Use your phone’s NFC to make payments. Built-in Android Pay for quick contactless checkouts.
Do more and play more! with the MediaTek Dimensity810|6m, Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core 2.4GHz processor

Read more

Product Description

COLOR
Multi Color White Blue Colorful White Red

Super Easy to Install

The car interior lights are pre-installed with optical fibers, which can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple.

High Quality LED Strip

Our car led lights are bright, waterproof and anti-collision. High-brightness led strip lights, lighting is more uniform. The colors and light effects are brighter.

Music Sync

The control button of the interior car lights can switch between different lighting modes with one key control. The controller has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which allows the interior lights to change with the rhythm of your favorite songs.

Car Decoration

With this interior light, you won’t get bored while driving. The lights of the light bar can dance with the music, as if you are in a fairy tale world, surrounded by “rainbow”, and accompany you through the long road.

Decorate Your Room

Our led strip lights are romantic creators, with soft and gorgeous lighting adding mood. Allows you to relax your mind while staying in your room.

For Family and Friends

The colorful lights of the LED strips create an exclusive party space for you, allowing you to have a party with your family and friends at any time. Create colorful life

【2022 Upgraded Version,Super Easy to Install】：The optical fiber of interior car lights has been pre-installed, and it can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple. Car led lights with USB plugs, plug and play, save more time. Suitable for RVs, camping cars, trailers, cars, trucks, SUVs, ATVs, boats, golf carts, etc.
【Sensitive Music Sensor】: The interior car lights system is equipped with a sound sensor to synchronize the car led lights with the music beat. The LED light strips will automatically change with the rhythm of music or sound to enhance your driving pleasure.
【Multiple Modes & 16 Million Colors】: Our car led lights has 3 light flashing modes, rhythm mode, cycle mode and fixed color mode, which can be switched by pressing the remote control button. There are 16 million colors in the luminous car interior lights, and you can adjust the color you like according to your mood or activity.
【2-wire Concealed Design & Safety 】: This led lights for car adopts a convenient, flexible and unique two-in-one design, which makes it easier to hide the thread in the gap, without worrying about exposed wiring or untidy appearance.The interior car lights is DC5v, built-in fuse, with short circuit protection and memory function. It has good waterproof performance and extremely low heat.
【Perfect Gift and Customer Service】: This Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.Our professional customer service team is on call at any time to provide excellent, lightning-fast response to each of your questions.

Colorful Diamond Steering Wheel Covers

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $29.99 - $22.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:06:55 UTC – Details)


Finding the important things in your life. Bluetooth powered SmartTags attach easily to keys, bags, or even the family pet. If you think your lost item is nearby but can’t quite find it, tap the ring button on your mobile and follow the familiar sound of your ringtone calling for you at the volume you set. Your tagged item is out of range? No problem! Even when offline, the Galaxy Find Network can use scanned data to find it for you privately. And it’s easy to scroll through a history of where the tag’s been to retrace it. You can also use other devices you own to locate your items.
Find it: If you lost your stuff, just launch the app, and see where it’s been last. Retracing your steps is easy.
Take it easy: There it is. Thanks to Galaxy SmartTags, finding lost items is smart and simple.
Use with a Galaxy smartphone running Android 8.0 or higher and RAM 2.0GB above. SmartThings app required.

More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1
Rear Camera: 48MP, F2.0 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 + 2MP, F2.4, Front Camera: 8MP, F2.2, Bluetooth 5.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41 – Dual SIM
International Model – No Warranty in US. Compatible with Most GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Cricket, Boost

Network
NO 5G AND NFC
Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. networks. TCL 30 SE android phone is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

Note
* TCL 30 SE is single SIM mobile phone, does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.
* Wifi calling supported on these carriers: T-mobile, Metro, Straight talk/tracfone t-mobile sim card, simple, walmart family mobile, ultra mobile, mint mobile.

Information
Turn your great times into magical memories with a 50MP AI triple camera. Enjoy collecting memories with large storage of up to 64GB. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, while a minimalistic design makes you live in style. The face key & fingerprint sensor provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:
2G Quadbands : GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands : B1/2/4/5/8
4G LTE bands: B2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17/26/28/66
Display: 6.52-inch Mini-notch HD+ 20:9 display (720 x 1600 pixels)
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 8MP
Chipset: Helio G25
CPU: 4 x Cortex-A53 @ 2.0GHz+4 x Cortex-A53 @ 1.5GHz
GPU: IMG GE8320 650MHz
Memory: 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Supports micro SD card up to 512GB, SD card not included)
Dimensions:.6.50 x 2.97 x 0.35 inch
Battery: 5000mAh
Audio：One speaker + dual-mic noise cancellation

What’s in the box
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile phone
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case
1 x Screen Protector
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Charger (5V 2A)
1 x Sim Card Pin 
1 x Quick Guide
Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.


Previous page

  1. PREMIUM DISPLAY, INTUITIVE FEATURES

    Enjoy the expansive 6.52” display, powered by NXTVISION. Watch as your videos and photos come to life with vibrant true-to-life color enhancements and real-time HDR upscaling.

  2. BINGE WITHOUT WORRY

    Adaptive Eye care modes reduce harmful blue lights, turn monochromatic for a booklike feel, and promotes readability in direct sunlight.

Next page

Previous page

  1. INTELLIGENTLY BEAUTIFUL

    Capturing stunning photos and HD video has never been so easy with AI-powered 50MP triple rear camera system with 2MP Depth and Macro lens.

  2. COMPLETE ANY CHALLENGE

    Use the built-in features to make taking the perfect photo even easier, with Gesture Shot a simple movement can activate the countdown timer and Steady Snap to capture motion with less blur.

  3. BEAUTIFULLY YOU

    Show your best side in video chats using the 8MP front-facing camera, while HDR elevates all your stunning selfies.

Next page

Previous page

  1. MAXIMUM RELIABILITY

    Take on your day or new adventures with a powerful 5000mAh battery delivers a days worth of mixed-use on a single charge letting you focus on the task at hand and not searching for the next outlet.

  2. MORE FOR YOU TO ENJOY

    Feel the sublime user experience powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core processor and multitask to your hearts delight with 4GB of RAM for always smooth performance.

  3. ENOUGH SPACE FOR IT ALL

    Store all of your favorite content with 64GB of internal storage, expandable to 512GB via microSD card (sold separately).

Next page

ARTFULLY CRAFTED, DIGITALLY SECURE

Simple and sleek with a finish that glistens in the light. Biometric security safely stores your data and content so only you can access it.

4

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99 - $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:40 UTC – Details)



Unlocked Smartphone

The TCL 30XL works with most major U.S. carriers, including Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile (Sprint not included). This android phone is also compatible with Metro PCS, Simple Mobile, Cricket, Ultra Mobile, H2O, Tello, Consumer Cellular, RedPocket (Only GSMA network), Pure talk, Viya, etc. If your phone doesn’t work with Verizon, please restart the phone. If your cell phone experiences an error when making calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices with the assistance of Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative. For Straight Talk and TracFone, this model only supports T-Mobile and AT&T compatible Sim cards but does not support Verizon compatible sim card. This mobile phone isn’t compatible with other CDMA networks, such as Sprint, Assurance wireless, Spectrum, Xfinity, Boost Mobile, etc.

WIFI Calling:

This phone supports WIFI Calling on the following Carriers: T-Mobile, Metro, Straight talk(AT&T and T-Mobile), Simple, Cricket, Ultra.

Technical Parameters：

Display: 6.82 inch V-notch HD+ 20.5:9 display (720 x 1640 pixels)
Screen: LCD
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+5MP Ultra-Wide Angle Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 13MP
Chipset: MT6762V
CPU: 4*A53 2.0Ghz + 4*A53 1.5Ghz Octa-Core
GPU: IMG GE8320
Memory: 6GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Expandable up to 512GB with Micro SD card, SD card not included)
Dimensions: 6.78 x 3.03 x 0.36 inch
Weight (g): 204.4g
Battery: 5000mAh 9V2A
2G Bands: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands: B2/4/5
4G LTE Bands: B2/4/5/12 (MFBI)/13/66/71/25/26/41HPUE
Sim Card: Single Sim, Nano-sized
Audio: Dual Speaker
Audio Jack: 3.5mm audio jack
System Language: English, Spanish and French

What’s Included

1 x TCL 30 XL Mobile phone
1 x 18W Charger (9V 2A)
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Sim Card Tray Pin
1 x Quick Guide
1 x LCD sticker
1 x Product Safety Information

Cinematic Viewing Experience – Featuring a 6.82 inch expansive screen with 20.5:9 aspect ratio and dual speakers design, the TCL 30XL android phone allows you to enjoy the thrill of cinematic viewing. The unique TCL NXTVISION Technology is able to boost color, clarity and contrast of visuals while protecting your eyes from harmful blue light. This TCL phone can work as a decent gaming phone, and is also perfect for streaming video and making video calls.
Large Battery, Fun for All Day – The 5000mAh mighty battery of this unlocked android smartphone can power up your entertainment for up to 3 days on one charge (estimated data based on internal lab test). With 18W fast-charging and an on-the-go reverse charging (OTG cable not included) option you can fuel and refuel your mobile phone in an instant.
Powerful, Smooth and Safe – With the 6GB Ram storage and Octa-Core processor, this unlocked cell phone provides you with an instant response time. Keep all of your precious memories with the 64GB built-in storage, and even more with a Micro SD card (sold separately) that lets you add up to 512GB memory. You can also multitask smoothly thanks to the Android 12 operating system and the floating window mode. The phone’s face unlock technology brings a carefree experience with abundant joy.
Seize the Beauty of Life – Explore the allure of highly detailed shots and broad landscape with the 50MP AI quad camera of this android phone. The AI camera system can optimize your picture according to different lighting conditions, and clear any unnecessary object that you select in the background, allowing you to be the protagonist all the time. The 13MP front-facing selfie camera of this stylish smartphone can capture you in a unique way.

Product Description

G91 PRO

A MASTER PIECE

The all-new G91 PRO is a stunning of hardware that combines unparalleled engineering and master craft design. It has a perfect ergonomic form factor with a state-of-the-art appeal. Available in Moonstone and Graphite.

FULL HD+ EXPERIENCE

Witness the ultimate viewing experience with the masterfully crafted 6.7” FULL HD+ Infinity DOT display. From surfing the web to watching movies, everything will be more real. Enjoy your favorite TV shows and games without the screen getting on the way.

EXTREME GAMING

The G91 PRO includes the advance Mediatek Helio G90 gaming chipset so you can blast trough all levels of your favorite game without delay. This stunning device is also rocking the latest Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core architecture, this enhancement to your smartphone is second to none.

G91 PRO

WORK HARD, PLAY HARDER

The G91 PRO exceeds all expectations with no fear. It has a supercharged 6GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage for your utmost convenience.

A FRESH PERSPECTIVE

Details every aspect of your life. The G91 PRO has a quad rear camera combination that has all the functions you need to take perfect photos.

ANDROID 11

Go straight to the stuff that matters most. Because Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone. Giving you powerful device controls. And easier ways to manage conversations, privacy settings and so much more.

WORRY LESS, DO MORE

With 30W ultra Quick Charge, you can power up your G91 PRO over 50% in less than 30 minutes.

Powerful Three-day battery. Capture more of life without stopping to recharge thanks to a 5000mAh battery with 30W, you can power up over 50% charger in less than 30 minutes.
Capture the best images and take the best selfies, with the Quad A.I 48MP Samsung GM1 sensor camera
Gorgeous 6.7” Full HD+ Infinity dot display. Watch your favorite movies and play your favorite games with stunning color and resolution
Do more and play more! with the MediaTek helio |G90T Gaming Octa-Core 2.0GHz processor
Operating System: Android 11
Box Content: G91 PRO, Screen protector, Rugged Case, Quick Guide, Sticker Charger, Type-C Cable, Headset, Sim Key
Global GSM and LTE bands for Latin America, North America, Europe, Africa LTE Bands: 1/2/3/4/5/7/12/17/28
